nodes.text: Luce was a female Dathomirian who was a member of the Nightsisters and a witch of Dathomir.

When Asajj Ventress returned from a failed attempt on Count Dooku, he sent the Separatist Droid Army under the command of General Grievous to Dathomir in revenge. Along with Ventress and her fellow Nightsisters, Luce began a counterattack against the opposition, during the battle she acquired two E-5 blaster rifles from droid commandos after being deprived of her energy bow. General Grievous dueled Asajj Ventress, but Ventress was defeated and was wounded. Luce retreated to help Ventress from the battlefield, but a blaster bolt shot from a battle droid struck her back. She fell down and died shortly after, but Asajj Ventress avenged her death by destroying the B1-Series battle droid that killed her.

During the battle of Dathomir Luce was able to defeat 2 commando
droids with one kick. She was later able to break one of the commando
droids arm. Luce also showed to have Force abilities, she showed this by Force crushing three super battle droids. She could also shoot an energy bow quite well. Luce had very good acrobatics, evident when she jumped onto a tree and the jumping to another tree without suffering a scratch. When she took two guns from the droids she was able to shoot both guns at
a rapid speed.
Luce was voiced in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series by Jaime King, who is known for voicing Aurra Sing in the series.
